name: svgSanitizer
description: A MODX wrapper for SVG Sanitizer, a PHP tool that cleans possibly malicious code fragments from SVG files. For more info, visit https://github.com/darylldoyle/svg-sanitizer.
author: Hugo Peek

snippets.name: svgSanitize
snippets.description: This snippet cleans a single SVG file and returns the output inline.
